original_title: One Night for One Drop: Imagined by Cirque du Soleil
overview: One Night for One Drop is an annual philanthropic event in which Cirque du Soleil cast and crew donate their talent and time to create a unique and breathtaking theatrical show for one night only in support of One Drop, an international non-profit organization dedicated to providing access to safe water.
title: One Night for One Drop: Imagined by Cirque du Soleil
